dblp.social.importer
Class DblpParser

java.lang.Object
  dblp.social.importer.DblpParser

public class DblpParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an instance of a dblp Parser, which parses the dblp data formatted as an XML (of known DTD), formats it into a specific model and stores it into a SQL db using hibernate. The actual parsing is done using the standard Java SAX XMLReader which is then customized to our needs by creating our own handler which can tell the XMLReader how to handle, interpret and format the dblp data and eventually store it

Author:
Staffiero
See Also:
XMLReader, DefaultHandler

Method Detail

parseDbpl

public boolean parseDbpl(PartFile pf,
                         ISodaHibernateSession session)
                  throws SodaHibernateException,
                         org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                         java.io.IOException
Parses a single dblp part file using the DblpImporterHandler. A part file is an xml file which represents a portion of the original dblp xml file. The part file is generated by the pre-parser. It provides support for checkpoints, it can resume a previous parse. Use this method to parse each dblp part file sequentially, this method does not provide support for multi threading.

Parameters:
pf: - the PartFile object which represents the part file to be parsed
session: - a ISodaHibernateSession used to persist data.
Returns:
true if when the method exits the part file has been updated.
Throws:
SodaHibernateException
org.xml.sax.SAXException
java.io.IOException

parseDbpl

public void parseDbpl(PartFile pf,
                      ThreadMonitor monitor,
                      ISodaHibernateSession session)
               throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      SodaHibernateException
Parses a single part file using the DblpImporterHandler. It provides support for checkpoints, it can resume a previous parse. Use this method if the parse is called within a thread.

Parameters:
pf: - the PartFile object which represents the part file to be parsed
monitor: - the threads monitor
session: - a ISodaHibernateSession used to persist data
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException
java.io.IOException
SodaHibernateException
